entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , West Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:11 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: West Vancouver 8:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 2.1°C
Wind: E 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of rain this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 50 to 70 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia early in the evening. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
